reqclientcert.name: reqclientcert
reqclientcert.help: Enable/disable to require client certificates for all SSL-VPN users.

banned-cipher.name: banned-cipher
banned-cipher.help: Select one or more cipher technologies that cannot be used in SSL-VPN negotiations. Only applies to TLS 1.2 and below.

options.name: RSA
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using RSA key.

options.name: DHE
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using authenticated ephemeral DH key agreement.

options.name: ECDHE
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using authenticated ephemeral ECDH key agreement.

options.name: DSS
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using DSS authentication.

options.name: ECDSA
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using ECDSA authentication.

options.name: AES
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using either 128 or 256 bit AES.

options.name: AESGCM
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites AES in Galois Counter Mode (GCM).

options.name: CAMELLIA
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using either 128 or 256 bit CAMELLIA.

options.name: 3DES
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using triple DES

options.name: SHA1
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using HMAC-SHA1.

options.name: SHA256
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using HMAC-SHA256.

options.name: SHA384
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using HMAC-SHA384.

options.name: STATIC
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using static keys.

options.name: CHACHA20
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using ChaCha20.

options.name: ARIA
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using ARIA.

options.name: AESCCM
options.help: Ban the use of cipher suites using AESCCM.

ciphersuite.name: ciphersuite
ciphersuite.help: Select one or more TLS 1.3 ciphersuites to enable. Does not affect ciphers in TLS 1.2 and below. At least one must be enabled. To disable all, set ssl-max-proto-ver to tls1-2 or below.

https-redirect.name: https-redirect
https-redirect.help: Enable/disable redirect of port 80 to SSL-VPN port.

ssl-client-renegotiation.name: ssl-client-renegotiation
ssl-client-renegotiation.help: Enable/disable to allow client renegotiation by the server if the tunnel goes down.

options.name: disable
options.help: Abort any SSL connection that attempts to renegotiate.

options.name: enable
options.help: Allow a SSL client to renegotiate.

force-two-factor-auth.name: force-two-factor-auth
force-two-factor-auth.help: Enable/disable only PKI users with two-factor authentication for SSL-VPNs.

servercert.name: servercert
servercert.help: Name of the server certificate to be used for SSL-VPNs.

algorithm.name: algorithm
algorithm.help: Force the SSL-VPN security level. High allows only high. Medium allows medium and high. Low allows any.

idle-timeout.name: idle-timeout
idle-timeout.help: SSL-VPN disconnects if idle for specified time in seconds.

auth-timeout.name: auth-timeout
auth-timeout.help: SSL-VPN authentication timeout (1 - 259200 sec (3 days), 0 for no timeout).

login-attempt-limit.name: login-attempt-limit
login-attempt-limit.help: SSL-VPN maximum login attempt times before block (0 - 10, default = 2, 0 = no limit).

login-block-time.name: login-block-time
login-block-time.help: Time for which a user is blocked from logging in after too many failed login attempts (0 - 86400 sec, default = 60).

login-timeout.name: login-timeout
login-timeout.help: SSLVPN maximum login timeout (10 - 180 sec, default = 30).

dtls-hello-timeout.name: dtls-hello-timeout
dtls-hello-timeout.help: SSLVPN maximum DTLS hello timeout (10 - 60 sec, default = 10).

tunnel-ip-pools.name: tunnel-ip-pools
tunnel-ip-pools.help: Names of the IPv4 IP Pool firewall objects that define the IP addresses reserved for remote clients.

tunnel-ipv6-pools.name: tunnel-ipv6-pools
tunnel-ipv6-pools.help: Names of the IPv6 IP Pool firewall objects that define the IP addresses reserved for remote clients.

dns-suffix.name: dns-suffix
dns-suffix.help: DNS suffix used for SSL-VPN clients.

url-obscuration.name: url-obscuration
url-obscuration.help: Enable/disable to obscure the host name of the URL of the web browser display.

http-compression.name: http-compression
http-compression.help: Enable/disable to allow HTTP compression over SSL-VPN tunnels.

http-only-cookie.name: http-only-cookie
http-only-cookie.help: Enable/disable SSL-VPN support for HttpOnly cookies.

deflate-min-data-size.name: deflate-min-data-size
deflate-min-data-size.help: Minimum amount of data that triggers compression (200 - 65535 bytes).

port-precedence.name: port-precedence
port-precedence.help: Enable/disable, Enable means that if SSL-VPN connections are allowed on an interface admin GUI connections are blocked on that interface.

auto-tunnel-static-route.name: auto-tunnel-static-route
auto-tunnel-static-route.help: Enable/disable to auto-create static routes for the SSL-VPN tunnel IP addresses.

header-x-forwarded-for.name: header-x-forwarded-for
header-x-forwarded-for.help: Forward the same, add, or remove HTTP header.

source-interface.name: source-interface
source-interface.help: SSL-VPN source interface of incoming traffic.

source-address6.name: source-address6
source-address6.help: IPv6 source address of incoming traffic.

source-address6-negate.name: source-address6-negate
source-address6-negate.help: Enable/disable negated source IPv6 address match.

source-interface.name: source-interface
source-interface.help: SSL-VPN source interface of incoming traffic.

source-address6.name: source-address6
source-address6.help: IPv6 source address of incoming traffic.

source-address6-negate.name: source-address6-negate
source-address6-negate.help: Enable/disable negated source IPv6 address match.

dtls-tunnel.name: dtls-tunnel
dtls-tunnel.help: Enable/disable DTLS to prevent eavesdropping, tampering, or message forgery.

check-referer.name: check-referer
check-referer.help: Enable/disable verification of referer field in HTTP request header.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable verification of referer field in HTTP request header.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable verification of referer field in HTTP request header.

http-request-header-timeout.name: http-request-header-timeout
http-request-header-timeout.help: SSL-VPN session is disconnected if an HTTP request header is not received within this time (1 - 60 sec, default = 20).

http-request-body-timeout.name: http-request-body-timeout
http-request-body-timeout.help: SSL-VPN session is disconnected if an HTTP request body is not received within this time (1 - 60 sec, default = 20).

auth-session-check-source-ip.name: auth-session-check-source-ip
auth-session-check-source-ip.help: Enable/disable checking of source IP for authentication session.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable checking of source IP for authentication session.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable checking of source IP for authentication session.

tunnel-connect-without-reauth.name: tunnel-connect-without-reauth
tunnel-connect-without-reauth.help: Enable/disable tunnel connection without re-authorization if previous connection dropped.

tunnel-user-session-timeout.name: tunnel-user-session-timeout
tunnel-user-session-timeout.help: Time out value to clean up user session after tunnel connection is dropped (1 - 255 sec, default=30).

transform-backward-slashes.name: transform-backward-slashes
transform-backward-slashes.help: Transform backward slashes to forward slashes in URLs.

encode-2f-sequence.name: encode-2f-sequence
encode-2f-sequence.help: Encode \2F sequence to forward slash in URLs.

encrypt-and-store-password.name: encrypt-and-store-password
encrypt-and-store-password.help: Encrypt and store user passwords for SSL-VPN web sessions.

client-sigalgs.name: client-sigalgs
client-sigalgs.help: Set signature algorithms related to client authentication. Affects TLS version <= 1.2 only.

options.name: no-rsa-pss
options.help: Disable RSA-PSS signature algorithms for client authentication.

options.name: all
options.help: Enable all supported signature algorithms for client authentication.

dual-stack-mode.name: dual-stack-mode
dual-stack-mode.help: Tunnel mode: enable parallel IPv4 and IPv6 tunnel. Web mode: support IPv4 and IPv6 bookmarks in the portal.

tunnel-addr-assigned-method.name: tunnel-addr-assigned-method
tunnel-addr-assigned-method.help: Method used for assigning address for tunnel.

options.name: first-available
options.help: Assign the first available address from the pools.

options.name: round-robin
options.help: Assign the available address from the pool with a round robin fashion.

saml-redirect-port.name: saml-redirect-port
saml-redirect-port.help: SAML local redirect port in the machine running FCT (0 - 65535). 0 is to disable redirection on FGT side.
